Class KdTree<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • whitebox.structures.KdTree<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KdTree.Manhattan, KdTree.SqrEuclid, KdTree.WeightedManhattan, KdTree.WeightedSqrEuclid

    public abstract class KdTree<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An efficient well-optimized kd-tree
